fields.message: Rule applicable: mod_to_bubble ([("Bubble", 6000)]), to expression: x % y, resulting in: {SafeMod(x,y) @ (y != 0)}
Rule applicable: bubble_up ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: ({SafeMod(x,y) @ (y != 0)} = 3), resulting in: {(SafeMod(x,y) = 3) @ And([(y != 0)])}
Rule applicable: expand_bubble ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: {(SafeMod(x,y) = 3) @ And([(y != 0)])}, resulting in: And([(SafeMod(x,y) = 3), And([(y != 0)])])
Rule applicable: introduce_modeq ([("Minion", 4200)]), to expression: (SafeMod(x,y) = 3), resulting in: ModEq(x, y, 3)
Rule applicable: remove_unit_vector_and ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: And([(y != 0)]), resulting in: (y != 0)
